messages.message:
Closing the loop on :point_up::skin-tone-4:

The release 2019-07-25 was built using open-cv4 which is what Karthik used as part of the UDFs.  The release 2019-08-23 saw the revert to open-cv3 which caused the errors to show up.

The next course of action is 2-folds:
1. Karthik is working on updating the UDFs to use open-cv3
2. We are in parallel working on deploying release 2019-07-25 to staging as a backup
Great work on the quick fix as well as setting up staging as a backup, @shaunak!

I think you guys might be busy, but it would be awesome to know the gist of how you found the issue starting from `too many values to unpack`.

(I tried to debug it my seeing the diff between past two releases and seeing return statements that changed. But that was too manual. Hence curious.)
